name: Get sword, kill dragon, save princess
name_original: Get sword, kill dragon, save princess
description:
Knight, you have a quest! Get the sword, kill the dragon and save the princess. Simple, right? If only the level would stop repeating. 

A puzzle game that requires a lot of thinking outside the box.  Anything you find that seems to be a glitch is probably part of the puzzle. Good luck!

Made for the 2019 One Room Bitsy Jam.

Created with Bitsy and aided by a lot of hacks by Sean LeBlanc and image-to-bitsy by ruin.
